title: Rajputana Kundan Jadau Bridal Set: A Timeless Splendor
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Hyderabadi Jadau Craftsmanship. The gold has an antique finish.
features: Elaborate Kundan setting with intricate floral and geometric designs, meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans. The choker-style necklace features a layered design of Kundan stones and pearl drops. The matching Jhumka earrings echo the necklace's design, with a graduated drop pattern leading to delicate pearl tassels.
description: This Kundan Jadau set is a testament to the rich heritage of Hyderabad's jewelry craftsmanship. The use of high-quality Kundan (Polki diamonds) gives it a regal look, while the antique gold finish adds a touch of vintage charm. It is durable, timeless, and carries significant cultural value, making it a cherished heirloom.
